SmartKom is an architecture that consists of different modules working together to provide a natural language interface. One important module is the SmartKom recognizer, which converts speech input into text. Another module is the generator, which produces output in natural language. The architecture also includes a knowledge modeler, which uses deep semantics to understand the meaning of the input. The goal of SmartKom is to create a system that can have natural and interactive conversations with users, allowing them to communicate their needs and receive appropriate responses. The importance of SmartKom lies in its ability to provide a more intuitive and user-friendly interface for various applications, such as tourist information systems. The architecture and modules of SmartKom are constantly evolving and being improved to enhance the user experience and provide more accurate and efficient communication.
